semsim.writing

Class AbstractRDFwriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • semsim.writing.AbstractRDFwriter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CASAwriter, SemSimRDFwriter

    public abstract class AbstractRDFwriter
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for serializing SemSim annotations in RDF format, either within XML-based modeling files such as SBML and CellML, or in CASA files used within OMEX archives.
    Author:
    mneal

        public java.lang.String getRDFString()
        Instsance-level method for getting the RDF content as a string (overload uses default format "RDF/XML-ABBREV").
        Returns:
        A string containing the RDF content.

      • getRDFmodelAsString

        public static java.lang.String getRDFmodelAsString(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model rdf,
                                                   java.lang.String rdfxmlformat)
        Parameters:
        rdf - An RDF Model object
        rdfxmlformat - The format to use when writing the Model to a String. Use "RDF/XML-ABBREV" if writing a standalone model (CellML, SBML, JSim project file). Use "RDF/XML" for CASA files in OMEX archives.
        Returns:
        A String representation of an RDF Model
